"A.D.2028/4/25/14:00": "Ardem!"
"Enga, and everyone. That was quick. Ophiel wasn't as useful as I thought. Well, it doesn't matter."
"Ardem, don't you move. You try anything and I'll put a bullet in your head!"
"Wow, I've never seen such anger from you, Enga. You really want to stop me that badly?"
"Of course. What you're trying to do is rewrite all of human history up to now!"
"Do you think there's anyone who will just roll over and accept it?"
"This isn't about what anyone wants, this has to be done, Enga."
"In order for people to evolve to the next level... For a paradigm shift of this world. There needs to be creation once more."
"Such selfish words! What about the people who are alive right now?!"
"Evolution is gained through sacrifice. Isn't that natural?"
"Sacrifices for evolution... Is the creation of those Phantoms what you truly desired?"
"They turned into those monsters when I tried to imagine them adopting to the new world. It's not a bad thing, per se. That's evolution too."
"Evolution in that way... No one wants that. Can you even call that evolution?"
"Like brother, like sister, you're both oblivious, Ms. Hitsugi. This isn't about hope or desire, but what must be done."
"Why are you so driven to seek evolution?"
"Let's reverse it, where do you all see hope in this world?"
"Humanity continues to destroy itself and the world, creating evoloving technology to do so. Even the appearance of a chance for change was brought into the same kind of conflict."
"I've watched over them for so long, by myself. It's become too difficult to watch any longer. This world. Humanity."
"In order to push this stagnant world forward, I'll prepare a paradise and revive the God of creation. Then, the Earth will evolve."
"Embodied weapons, Phantoms, they're all trivial.The perfection of Ether's embodiment... as told since ancient times, the time leading up to God's revival."
"And by the hands of God, this world will change, and move towards a new reborn future."
"The path to the future is something you carve for yourself! It's not something you just ask someone else to do, Ardem!"
"I'm sorry you can't understand me, Enga. In the end, not even we could escape it. Having to fight each other, the curse of humanity."
"Now, let's begin. My first and final battle."
"Quest progress has been saved."
